participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and insightful, Emily loves to explore the intricacies of the human mind.
participant_1.background: i'm also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.
